bioconda.name: shapeit5
bioconda.summary: Fast and accurate method for estimation of haplotypes (phasing).

biotools.summary: SHAPEIT5 is a software package to estimate haplotypes in large genotype datasets (WGS and SNP array).

bioschemas.name: SHAPEIT5
bioschemas.summary: SHAPEIT5 is a software package to estimate haplotypes in large genotype datasets (WGS and SNP array).
